## LowerNumberRangeMatcher type

Matcher values of a lower limit for a filter with a $between [Matcher](./answers-core.matcher.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type LowerNumberRangeMatcher = Matcher.GreaterThan | Matcher.GreaterThanOrEqualTo;
```
